flow.descriptionCdata:
30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.06eef9c5-82ec-4392-a89e-2b306fdf9d12.prompt=Enter a value for timeout 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.0845f550-7311-46b2-b76e-70997fcd1c0e.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.0a6a8aac-7c23-4d60-bc64-5ee8c3c2a01b.prompt=Enter a value for keystore 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.129eea2d-d063-427a-9526-7f8a89387e8c.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.16ca34ea-fdfb-41bc-96c3-4fc2e10f9c7c.prompt=Enter a value for trustKeystore 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.1a536c1c-e3ec-4826-a5fd-91581e06b713.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.1aad9a42-960c-49dd-815f-01b6b5b56d48.prompt=Enter a value for kerberosConfFile 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.2c76915d-e739-4db4-a62e-d1c97e85d5cc.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.3215129a-62f4-45e6-b695-67884b1212f5.prompt=Enter a value for trustAllRoots 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.3280249c-de93-41cb-bc20-d7eceb2cc7df.description=
This workflow returns the details of the given artifact id.

Inputs-
artifactId –   Artifact  Id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
Valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
socketTimeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for the data to be retrieved. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A socketTimeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
followRedirects - If true, the GET command automatically follows redirects. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
name –  name of the artifactr 
displayName – display name of the artifact
artifactType – Artifact type
state – state of the artifact
lifeCycleState –  life cycle state of the artifact
lifeCycleSubState – life cycle sub state of the artifact
document  – returned XML document from API
30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.3d9806fe-5baf-4e9b-8609-a4b42b167a69.prompt=Enter a value for authType 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.45a34348-ae07-4e74-aeee-152a0895515a.prompt=Enter a value for socketTimeout 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.45cc8e1e-66ab-4179-a7c3-873f1b7e7248.prompt=Value\: 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.45e0a818-e607-40b1-ba4b-cfd3ac761126.prompt=User Identifier 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.54a454b9-770b-4aa4-abdc-0730d552f5c1.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.6c2e6908-68c9-4384-90e0-e394199fc1da.prompt=User Identifier 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.6fb5eff9-0ee2-454f-8b26-6c2656418f04.prompt=Enter a value for userAgent 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.6fb8f820-4135-45fb-bd67-aae36f5afd3f.prompt=User Identifier 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.7d5b56e5-1e14-44e6-9d34-c6faa7e2e27a.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPort 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.81c5e51f-c435-45ce-84ea-934a35b46090.prompt=Value\: 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.85e84f88-cf5c-4ed5-a9af-411646efa10d.prompt=Enter a value for encodeURL 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.9580ad9c-906a-46ac-809d-8d4209d62e27.prompt=Process Instance ID 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.9ed650a6-c050-4815-80d2-d6e578523a3c.description=
Check to see if the value stored in a specified flow variable, denoted by key, is null.

Inputs\:
keyName - The key to check, i.e. the name of the flow variable.

Returns\: 
The value in the specified key, i.e. flow variable.

Responses\:
isNull - If the key is a null pointer, i.e. the flow variable doesn't have an assigned value.
notNull - If some value is stored in the key, i.e the flow variable has a value assigned.
30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.a1097e2b-d712-48f3-b0fd-5311aa0afb68.prompt=Enter a value for trustPassword 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.b5116e24-46f8-4536-b0e4-efa1755a3ad3.prompt=Enter a value for useCookies 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.bfbe3251-72a9-4a2a-97ee-e1fd4a917105.prompt=Process Instance ID 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.cc165bba-6045-47bb-9229-1215ad04e76c.prompt=Enter a value for followRedirects 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.cd1a62c3-10cd-4751-add5-f0b99ca6c258.prompt=Enter a value for keystorePassword 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.ce815b25-7da3-408d-add3-d4e2741d6463.description=
Check to see if the value stored in a specified flow variable, denoted by key, is null.

Inputs\:
keyName - The key to check, i.e. the name of the flow variable.

Returns\: 
The value in the specified key, i.e. flow variable.

Responses\:
isNull - If the key is a null pointer, i.e. the flow variable doesn't have an assigned value.
notNull - If some value is stored in the key, i.e the flow variable has a value assigned.
30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.d1cc0ddb-3e8c-4aed-beb5-10c3f49d3da1.prompt=Artifact ID 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.d3978c4a-6cdb-40bc-99a3-9aa3e3e70845.description=
Thsi workflow retrieves all the child components of the input component id.

Inputs\:

artifactId		- Component id for which the child components wil be retrieved
userIdentifier	- User Identifier to pass to the wrapper flow to retrieve the child components

Responses\:
success - Workflow completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.description=
Sends a Email notification for the customer REQ_USER_ID

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.
30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.f2d36006-94c7-4a62-9593-98970a9cee17.prompt=Enter a value for proxy 30347243-7747-430a-8d5a-6fe54c8a10a7.fb74f87a-e1cd-4299-9705-3b0cd1e6e4a8.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPassword
flow.name: Email Notification

staticBinding.value:
Greetings,
Please use the following credentials to login into your instance.
Login : root password: aexxxx
You may have to change the password after first login.
For help and support, please visit CSA Consumer portal
Sincerely, HP CSA Team
Welcome to HP CSA Services. Subscription ${subscriptionName} has been deployed successfully

Greetings, Thanks for creating an instance on HP CSA.
The following are the instance details for your subscription.
${serverMessageFormat}
Login credentials will be send in a separate email.
For help and support, please visit CSA Consumer portal
Sincerely, HP CSA Team
